section.name: Unit 1: Building Our Knowledge about Motivation and Persistence
section.summary: In Unit 1, you will discover what the research says motivates adult learners to persist based on reading a summary of the National Research Council’s 2012 report, Improving Adult Literacy Instruction: Supporting Learning and Motivation. Through a narrated PowerPoint presentation, subject matter experts guide your reflection on your related knowledge and prior experience as adult learners and teachers and share their own related teaching experiences in the classroom. A short quiz helps check your comprehension of the reading.
